products.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Ruby Red Panel Blind
products.description: Splash ruby red panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The saturated red, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Mid Grey Panel Blind

Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with a various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. products.title: Splash Lipstick Pink Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant, splash lipstick pink panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your large window. The bold pink shade, adds flair and saturated colour which can make for a dramatic finish to your room. As their panel blinds are available at 5 metres width and 3 metres drop, panel blinds are a great way to divide a large room or to dress a large window. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with a various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.

products.title: Splash Grey Panel Blind
products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This grey panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.

products.title: Splash Noir
products.description: Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months stack: a choice of left, right or split. Controls: wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across. Headrail: robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required. Fixings: top fix or face fix brackets. Buy made to measure splash noir standard panel blinds from soeasy blinds.
